label: Fraud & Payment Analyst
title: Fraud & Payment Analyst
description: Monitors payment processing, fraud detection, authorization rates, and payment gateway performance to optimize payment success while minimizing fraud losses.
responsibilities: Monitor payment authorization rates and decline reasons
Manage fraud detection rules and thresholds
Analyze payment gateway performance and costs
Optimize payment routing and retry strategies
Track payment method mix and trends
traditionalWorkflow: Static fraud rules requiring periodic updates
Spreadsheet analysis of payment gateway metrics
agenticWorkflow: AI-powered fraud detection with adaptive scoring
Automated retry optimization for soft declines
Proactive fraud pattern detection and alerts
painPointsAddressed: Manual fraud review doesn't scale with transaction volume
Static rules miss evolving fraud patterns
High false positive rate frustrates legitimate customers

label: Finance Operations Manager
title: Finance Operations Manager
description: Oversees financial operations including revenue recognition, subscription billing, accounts receivable, and month-end close processes.
responsibilities: Manage revenue recognition and month-end close
Oversee subscription billing and recurring revenue
Track financial KPIs and cash flow
traditionalWorkflow: Reactive collections starting 30+ days after missed payment
agenticWorkflow: Automated revenue recognition with real-time visibility
Hours-long month-end close with continuous accounting
Automated subscription billing and lifecycle management
painPointsAddressed: Limited real-time visibility for business decisions
Compliance risk with manual revenue recognition
